comment: Overall easy class but I'm not learning anything. You have to teach yourself. The PowerPoints explain nothing. She doesn't actually teach, just reads off what the powerpoints say. Do not take this class if you actually want to learn Python from it. Instead I've had to resort to YouTube and classmates to learn. Really a waste of money on this class.

Great home lab experience (1114L) and intuitive topics for discussion(1114), she was very helpful through it all. There were clear expectations set and met for good foundational python experience.Thank you Dr. Zhao! Would take again!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Easy course but Prof Zhao makes it even easier with the clear grading and being accessible out of class.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy

comment: Only took her for the 1114L and it was fairly easy. Grade is made up of the 12 weekly labs. Enters grades in D2L quickly and responds to emails in a timely manner. Learned a lot about Python in the labs alone so I would definitely take her. Very beginner-friendly.

loved her, she made learning and understanding very easy. If someone didn't like her and or got a bad grade in the class they did not read the instructions clearly and they did not email her for help. She response very quickly during and outside her office hour. i would take her again for my other coding classes if I could.

I love her and I would take her again. I didn't know any python,But set up tutoring sessions with her and she will explain everything clear and you will understand the material and code. If you got a bad grade you didn't read the instructions clearly and didn't ask for help.And she response quickly and she doesn't manually grade it is auto graded.
Would not take this class again. I'm learning absolutely nothing in the class I'm having to teach myself. the powerpoints are awful and explain nothing.
